question: Today, the internet and TV have created that chance for ordinary people to become famous. Is it a positive or negative development?
text: It is an irrefutable fact that the technology and media is gaining popularity nowadays. World wide web and television is crazily turning the lives of people around and making them popular as ever. In my opinion, I strongly believe that this insightful development has proved to very beneficial for the people as this not only provides a global platform to showcase their talent but also provide a monetary benefit.

First and foremost, the wide use of internet and TV has made it quite evident that it only requires a good platform to bridge the gap between talented people and great opportunities. This is because, a common platform facilitates opportunities for people to reveal their performances to the world. Moreover, people can benefit the most, if their talent reaches the right audience. For instance, in 2016, in India, a director was astonished by the singing of a participant in a reality show named "India's Got Talent", and that singer was rightaway signed for his next movie. Hence, the right platform offered by technologies can take people to places.

Another point to consider is the monetary benefits that can be earned just with the help of internet and social media. In fact, gaining a side income with very little effort is just like a dream come true. For example, creating youtube channels with a variety of tutorial videos is becoming the new thing. This not only provides a means to share your skills at a global level but can also make your bank accounts happy. With the help of adsense feature on youtube, 30% people in every city in US, are earning a side income just by sitting home and creating videos. Therefore, with the correct use of technology and internet services, one can easily make good amount of money.

In conclusion, in today's modern world, people are greatly benefitted from the usefulness of the cutting-edge technologies in order to make them popular. This development has proved to be more advantageous because it brings people from different parts of the world to one stage and also proves to be economically helpful.
